localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title: S&P 500 ends the year up 18.5%, besting all wall street forecasts in spite of a global pandemic, the largest quarterly economic contraction ever (Q2), and the highest intra-year Unemployment Rate (14.7%) since the Great Depression. $SPX https://t.co/0BUIKvxxMY
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 标准普尔500指数(S&amp；P500)年底上涨了18.5%，超过了华尔街的所有预测，尽管全球疫情肆虐，第二季度经济出现有史以来最大规模的收缩，年内失业率(14.7%)也是大萧条(Great Depression)以来的最高水平。https://t.co/0BUIKvxxMY px斯普林特
標準普爾500指數(S&amp；P500)年底上漲了18.5%，超過了華爾街的所有預測，儘管全球疫情肆虐，第二季度經濟出現有史以來最大規模的收縮，年內失業率(14.7%)也是大蕭條(Great Depression)以來的最高水平。https://t.co/0BUIKvxxMY px斯普林特
